tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dancers (
    dancer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    dancer_name VARCHAR (50) NOT NULL,
    next_of_kin_name VARCHAR (50),
    next_of_kin_contact VARCHAR (20),
    medical_conditions TEXT,
    allergies TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DancerContacts (
    dancer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dancer_name VARCHAR(50),
    next_of_kin_name VARCHAR(50),
    next_of_kin_contact VARCHAR(20),
    medical_conditions TEXT,
    allergies TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DancerEmergencyContacts (
    dancer_id INT NOT NULL,
    next_of_kin_name TEXT,
    next_of_kin_phone TEXT,
    medical_conditions TEXT,
    allergies TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (dancer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NextOfKinContacts (
    next_of_kin_id INT NOT NULL,
    dancer_id INT NOT NULL,
    name TEXT,
    phone TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (next_of_kin_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (dancer_id) REFERENCES DancerEmergencyContacts(dancer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalConditionsAllergies (
    medical_condition_id INT NOT NULL,
    dancer_id INT NOT NULL,
    medical_condition TEXT,
    allergy TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (medical_condition_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (dancer_id) REFERENCES DancerEmergencyContacts(dancer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Dancer ( 
    dancer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    full_name STRING, 
    phone_number STRING, 
    email STRING, 
    address STRING 
);

CREATE TABLE NextOfKin ( 
    next_of_kin_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    dancer_id UUID, 
    full_name STRING, 
    relationship STRING, 
    phone_number STRING 
);

CREATE TABLE DancerInfo (
    DancerID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    DancerName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    DancerPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    DancerEmail VARCHAR(50),
    EmergencyContactName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    EmergencyContactPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    NextOfKinName VARCHAR(50),
    NextOfKinPhoneNumber VARCHAR(15),
    MedicalConditions TEXT,
    Allergies TEXT
);
